concise_definition: n. （专有名词）多兰（姓氏或地名）

definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, typically used as a surname of Irish origin, or occasionally as a place name. It does not have a general lexical meaning in English.
definitions.explanation_cn: 专有名词，通常为爱尔兰姓氏，偶尔用作地名，在英语中无通用词义。
definitions.example_en: Dr. Dolan presented her research at the international conference.
definitions.example_cn: 多兰博士在国际会议上展示了她的研究成果。
